moreInfoList: Pug was introduced to me, it opened a whole new world.
Scss changed the way i looked at CSS and styling a web page in general !
I finally had the chance to put all the puzzle pieces together and find my passion.
I had the chance to learn more about JavaScript.
Practiced JavaScript Vanilla on diffrent projects.
Learned to work with a group of people, share ideas and help eachother.
I was also introduced to JavaScript.
I have done my few basic projects.
When I finished the course I was awarded a NanoDegree.
